explains: n. 手枪；<美，非正式>精力旺盛的人
wordGroup: pocket pistol [戏谑语、口语](可藏在衣袋里的)小酒瓶 [亦作pocket-pistol]

sentences.en: A starter's pistol fires only blanks.
sentences.cn: 初学者的手枪发射的只是空弹。

sentences.en: The man fired several shots from his pistol.
sentences.cn: 那个男人用手枪开了几枪。

sentences.en: The pistol came to pieces, easily and quickly.
